name: VntConverter
short_description: After exporting memos to memory card these can be converted to text (txt) files by VntConverter. These text files can be modified as usual with an editor like Notepad++ (text files are written with UTF-8 encoding). Afterwards they can be converted back to memo (vnt, vNote) files again by VntConverter. The last step is to reimport them into the Memo App.
summary: Converts Samsung Wave S8500 memo files to text files and vice versa
